lines.text: You left the outside world; you've got to orient your thinking. You've got think repression, think limits. Think humiliation and despair. You're in high school for Christ sakes!

[drunk]
Well, Ezzard, you are looking at a wanted man.

[tapping his nose]
You don't get a nose like this breaking stocks... I'm a stock broker, dammit!
What is in this stuff? This has a lot of proof in it. These... these high school kids - have you noticed this? - they're so, doc, am I crazy, they seem so - YOUNG!
Okay, on one end of the spectrum you've got homo, and on the other you've got hetero. Then there's me, way the fuck over here!
Do you ever ask yourself "How did I get here?"
Yeah, I used to, but now I just ask myself "How do I get out?"
